      • getConsumerGroup

        public java.lang.String getConsumerGroup(TaskContext ctx)
        This method returns the consumer group for this consumer. By default it returns the task name, which will effectively load balance the data from kafka across the tasks of this type. Users can override this method to change this behaviour
        Parameters:
        ctx - Instance of TaskContext
